description: When a flood of natural disasters begins to destroy the world, a divorced dad desperately tries to save his family by outrunning the cataclysmic chaos.

title: Wanted
cast: Daad Rizk, Georges Diab, Sihame Haddad, Georges Boukhalil, Aida Sabra, Pierre Rabbat, Myriam Klink, Dory El Samarany, Josyane Boulos
description: Four seniors embark on misadventures after breaking out of their nursing home to save a loved one’s grave from demolition by estate developers.

title: Just Say Yes
director: Appie Boudellah, Aram van de Rest
cast: Yolanthe Cabau, Noortje Herlaar, Kim-Lian van der Meij, Nienke Plas, Pip Pellens, Jim Bakkum, Huub Smit, Edwin Jonker
description: Incurable romantic Lotte finds her life upended when her plans for a picture-perfect wedding unravel — just as her self-absorbed sister gets engaged.

title: Ava
cast: Jessica Chastain, Colin Farrell, John Malkovich, Common, Geena Davis, Jess Weixler, Diana Silvers, Joan Chen, Ioan Gruffudd
description: An elite assassin wrestling with doubts about her work scrambles to protect herself — and her estranged family — after a hit goes dangerously wrong.

title: Bombshell
cast: Ande Cunningham, Mark Mitchinson, Mia Pistorius, Nathalie Boltt, Nathan Lovejoy, Colin Moy, Jay Simon, Coen Falke, Greta Gregory, Byron Coll
description: In 1985, when a vessel protesting nuclear testing is sunk in New Zealand, local police fight to prove it was a terrorist plot by their French allies.
